title: Directions of horizontal forces on a truck

content.question: The figure above shows a truck pulling three crates across a rough road. Which of the following shows the directions of all the horizontal forces acting on crate 2 ?

choices.label: The figure presents a box. An leftward pointing arrow labeled Rope extends from the left side of the box. A rightward pointing arrow labeled Cable extends from the right side of the box.

The figure presents a box. Two leftward pointing arrows extend from the left side of the box. The top arrow is labeled Rope and the bottom arrow is labeled Crate 3. A rightward pointing arrow labeled Cable extends from the right side of the box.

The figure presents a box. Three leftward pointing arrows extend from the left side of the box. From top to bottom the arrows are labeled as follows: Rope, Crate 3, and Friction. A rightward pointing arrow labeled Cable extends from the right side of the box.

The figure presents a box. Two leftward pointing arrows extend from the left side of the box. The top arrow is labeled Rope and the bottom arrow is labeled Friction. Two rightward pointing arrows extend from the right side of the box. The top arrow is labeled Cable and the bottom arrow is labeled Crate 3.

content.answer: The figure presents a box. Three leftward pointing arrows extend from the left side of the box. From top to bottom the arrows are labeled as follows: Rope, Crate 3, and Friction. A rightward pointing arrow labeled Cable extends from the right side of the box.
